Secondly, it is not up to individual believers or even the leadership of the Jehovah Witnesses to determine who goes to heaven. That decision is solely made by God according to their beliefs. 
Therefore, the correct answer is (B) no, not every resident of Los Angeles County or anyone else will go to Jehovah Witnesses' heaven.
